document.full_text: a pennsylvania mayor wants to sell thousands of historical artifacts acquired by a previous administration in a failed effort to build a wild west museum in the central part of the state, a spokesman said on wednesday.
document.title: items bought for pennsylvania wild west museum may be sold
lines_and_colors: a pennsylvania mayor wants to sell thousands of historical artifacts acquired by a previous administration in a failed effort to build a wild west museum in the central part of the state, a spokesman said on wednesday.
